extracted_playbook.title: Install Product Behind a Firewall
extracted_playbook.description: Install all versions of the OPW Fuel Management Systems product behind a firewall as primary protection.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Version V17Q.2.1
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade systems running versions prior to V17Q.2.1 to V17Q.2.1.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact DFS for Version Confirmation
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Dover Fueling Systems to confirm that the build has the required fixes for versions newer than V17Q.2.1.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement ICS Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
